panels.description: The number of queries that are received over TCP/UDP.
panels.title: Query Transport

panels.description: Number of incoming queries that are answered from cache.
panels.title: Query Hits

panels.description: Number of queries that did not have its answers in cache and need resolving.
panels.title: Query Misses

panels.description: Cache effectiveness, the number of queries that are retrieved from cache divided by the total number of incoming queries.
panels.title: Query Hit Ratio

panels.description: How long it took to resolve the query
panels.title: Query by Duration
